Event DAO¶

class events.dao.event.EventDao¶

Bases: events.dao.base.BaseDao, events.daointerface.eventinterface.EventDaoInterface

create_event(name: str, description: str, spotify_genre: str, location: str, min_request_price: int, date: datetime.date, time: datetime.time) → events.models.event.Event¶

DAO method used to create an instance in the database of the Event model from the passed validated argument fields

Parameters

  • name – Name of the Event

  • description – Description of the Event

  • spotify_genre – Spotify Genre of the Event

  • location – Location of the Event

  • min_request_price – Minimum song request price

  • date – Date of the Event

  • time – Time of the Event

Returns

an Event model object

find_all_upcoming() → django.db.models.query.QuerySet¶

DAO method used to query the database for all the events that are in the coming days

Returns

a set of all the Event model objects

find_by_id(id: int) → events.models.event.Event¶

DAO method used to query the database for an Event by its “ID”

Parameters

id – the primary key “ID” of an Event

Returns

an Event model object

model¶

alias of events.models.event.Event
